Experienced Educators/Tutors/Teachers at Myschool




        
    

        
        Myschool.ng is Nigeria’s No.1 Students’ and Educational Resource Website, dedicated to supporting students at all levels with the information, tools, and materials they need to succeed.

As part of our mission to expand learning through video-based education, we are currently recruiting passionate and knowledgeable educators to join our team in delivering high-quality academic content to Nigerian students preparing for JAMB, WAEC, NECO, and other major examinations.

Job: On-site Video Tutors/Teachers (Various Subjects)
     

            
    



Location: Lekki-Ajah, Lagos.
NOTE: There's no on-site accommodation available so you should already reside around the Lekki-Ajah axis.
Employment Type: Full-time

Subjects We're Hiring For

We are hiring tutors for a wide range of subjects. Teachers may be assigned multiple related subjects based on expertise:

Science Subjects:
Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Agricultural Science, Animal Husbandry, Further Mathematics

Language and Literary Studies:
English Language, Literature in English, French, Arabic, Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo

Commercial Subjects:
Economics, Commerce, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping, Marketing, Insurance, Office Practice

Humanities and Social Sciences:
Government, History, Civic Education, Christian Religious Knowledge (CRK), Islamic Religious Knowledge (IRK), Geography

Technical, Vocational, and ICT Subjects:
Computer Studies, Data Processing, Catering Craft Practice, Technical Drawing, Food and Nutrition, Home Economics, Home Management

Creative and Physical Subjects:
Fine Arts, Music, Physical Education

To have an idea of what you'll likely be doing, visit the Myschool YouTube page

Key Responsibilities


	Develop and record engaging video lessons for secondary school subjects based on the Nigerian curriculum (WAEC/NECO/JAMB standards)
	Present educational content clearly and confidently in front of a camera
	Review and improve existing academic materials
	Solve and explain past questions and likely exam questions in a step-by-step format
	Collaborate with the content development team to ensure accuracy and quality
	Participate in additional academic content development tasks as required


Requirements


	NCE or Bachelor's Degree in relevant subject(s)
	Minimum of 2 years of teaching or tutoring experience
	Deep knowledge of the subject and familiarity with exam syllabi (WAEC, NECO, JAMB)
	Strong presentation and communication skills
	Must reside within or be able to commute to the Lekki-Ajah area of Lagos
	Must be confident teaching and presenting on video
	Ability to work closely with our in-house production and academic teams


Application Deadline

9th August, 2025

How to Apply

Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to:

Email: jobs@myschool.ng
Subject Line: [Your Subject] Video Tutor Application
Example: "Biology Video Tutor Application"

You may also include a short sample video lesson (2–5 minutes) if available. This will give us an idea of your teaching and presentation style.

We look forward to working with educators who are eager to make an impact on the future of learning in Nigeria.
